alert.note: Alert for Laurens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 2:55PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Laurens County through 330 PM EDT... At 255 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Chappells Mill, or 8 miles northwest of Dublin, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dublin, East Dublin, Dudley, Montrose, Chappells Mill, and Harlow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
